item.description:
1. Drinking champagne could reduce risk of sudden cardiac arrest, study suggests  The Guardian
  2. Cheers! This alcoholic drink can help prevent sudden cardiac arrest — and it’s not red wine  New York Post
  3. Drinking white wine could reduce risk of cardiac arrest - study  Sky News
  4. Champagne ‘protects’ heart from cardiac arrest  The Telegraph
